content: CU 4-22 USB Charger adapter USB charging adapter for Nuron batteries, with wireless charging, USB-C PD, and USB-A ports to charge laptops, tablets, and more devices ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Jobsite essentials- ### FEATURES:Features Nuron power bank – turn any Nuron battery into a portable power source, so you can quickly and fully recharge all your USB devices Simultaneous charging – 2 USB ports and wireless charging allows you to fast charge multiple devices at the same time Built for real jobsite conditions – compact size and durable housing offers a portable power adapter for charging all your devices on-site or on the go Built-in flashlight – LED light turns your 22V Nuron battery into a convenient flashlight Future-proof design – USB-A and USB-C ports compatible with latest mobile devices and all future Nuron batteries Applications Adapter enabling any Nuron battery to charge USB devices such as laptops, tablets, phones, and more Wireless phone charging (up to 10W) USB-C Power Delivery charging (up to 65W) USB-A charging (up to 18W) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Battery voltage compatibility: Nuron Technical Data | Battery voltage compatibility | Nuron ### ITEMS- 2392709 - USB charging adapter CU 4-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CU 4-22 USB charging adapter
